name: The Mystic Marriage of Saint Catherine with Saints and a Doge
description: The Mystic Marriage of Saint Catherine with Saints and a Doge; Andrea Schiavone (Andrea Meldolla) (Italian, about 1510 - 1563); Italy; about 1550 - 1553; Pen and brown ink and gray wash, heightened with white gouache; 27.3 x 31.8 cm (10 3/4 x 12 1/2 in.); 91.GG.77; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Mystic Marriage of Saint Catherine with Saints and a Doge
medium: Pen and brown ink and gray wash, heightened with white gouache
